thread.title: Kind mystery runner is ‘overwhelmed’

author: news24.com
title: Kind mystery runner is ‘overwhelmed’
text:
Pietermaritzburg - The Mandela Day Marathon runner who gave her medal to a fellow runner to give to his child has been found.
The Witness reported on Thursday that Durban resident Mark Savides took part in the Mandela Day Half-Marathon last Sunday and during the last few kilometres of the race began taking strain with cramps in his feet.
As he struggled on, he said a mystery woman, whose name he later learnt was Akash Singh, approached him and encouraged him to go on, and insisted on staying by his side until the finish line.
Savides said he had mentioned to the woman that the worst part of the race would be his two young sons fighting over who got the medal. At the finish line, the woman handed over her medal to Savides before disappearing into the crowd.
